case.state: My name is Estellise Sidos Heurassein. Please, call me Estelle!
Yuri teased me, telling me that I wouldn't be brave enough for this game. Maybe I'm not as good as Judith, but I'm just as brave as her!
Yuri said I wasn't brave or sexy enough for this kind of game, which is why I've come to prove myself through my actions!
A goddess and her servant? I hope you two get along well enough… the maids in the castle can be really overbearing sometimes.
If I remember Judith's advice correctly, I should exchange ~cards~ cards now.
(Just remember what Rita told you, Estelle!) ~cards~ new cards, please!
Okay, dealer! I want ~cards~ new cards, please!
I don't know if Yuri would do the same, but I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
How wonderful! I don't need to exchange any cards at all.
Huh? What should I do now? I don't need any other cards... I think I should just keep them.
Is that...? Yes, that's already a very good hand. No need for new cards at all!
Look how much better I got! If only Yuri could see me now...
"A good hand is almost certain victory, when only the worst hand loses!" That's what my poker guide says!
Thanks for all the poker lessons you gave me, Judith. They really weren't all for naught.
It appears as though I've been granted an angel’s favor! I shouldn't squander this...
I know how to play these cards right! Wait a... yeah! I have a nice hand!
Good fortune is just falling into my lap today! Is all that praying I did finally paying off?
I have been trained by experts at poker… I will not lose this game!
Hehe… could this be a sign of my quick victory?
"If only the worst hand loses, you can win even with having an average one." That's what I read in my poker guide.
Could this be...? Oh, wait, it's just average. I keep forgetting that this deck doesn't have a Joker.
I suppose I can't get something amazing every time... but maybe that means someone else has good fortune right now!
So... how is everyone doing? I hope you're all having a wonderful day!
That's a nice hand. But I won't tell you what exactly I have, not until you show us your hand, ~player~.
I think I'm doing good this round. What about everyone else?
As another player here tonight, I offer my warmest welcome. Now, may the best player win!
I hope we all get along here tonight!
Alright then... is this everyone who agreed to turn up? Then let us begin!
I wonder... just how did this establishment come to be? I barely know anyone here, and neither did Yuri for that matter...
I'm probably going to lose, but that's fine. You deserve my luck more than me!
I hope this bad luck isn't going to be a trend... I can't afford it!
Oh, no! I forgot what Yuri said I should do in this situation...
I should’ve put more thought into what I was going to swap...
Ah! I feared this might happen... Looks like I was too hasty.
Oh no... Is this a bad omen of things to come?
I hope we all... oh no! Is this how my luck here starts?
I was optimistic coming here, but now I'm not so sure...
You know how big his penis is? What is it like? Are you two a couple? Is it- ...Wait, you said we shouldn't ask, didn't you...
"A flush is a very powerful hand that contains 5 cards of the same suit"... That means this hand is almost unbeatable, doesn't it?
Hey, I got a three of a kind... and a pair, too. Isn't that a full house?
"Depending on how high the value of your pair is, it could be either a good or a bad hand"... That's what I read in my guide, anyway.
"A safe way not to lose the round is to keep the pairs you have" - The very first piece of advice in my poker guide.
Is this really possible? I read in a book that there isn't a better hand than this!
"If you have five cards of sequential rank, your hand is called a straight" - That's what the poker book said!
And I thought the flush was unbeatable...
I guess the first loss goes to me... I should start with something small to get used to these poker rules.
I know someone has to take the loss of the first turn, but I was hoping it wouldn't be me! Is it okay to start with something small?
I lost the first hand? Hopefully this isn't going to be the kind of luck I can expect for the rest of the game. I better start with something small to not fall behind.
I lost? Alright! Time to show that I'm brave enough to s-strip in front of strangers! Being in the lead should boost my courage to do so!
S-so, I have to strip now, don't I? Okay, I'm prepared for this. I even thought about what piece of my wardrobe to remove first.
Huh? I'm in last place? How can that be when I didn't lose once?
Oh no, I’m already behind everyone on the very first hand! L-let me remove something small to catch up to you guys!
I suppose my gloves'd be good enough to remove first, given how little they cover.
These gloves are made from an incredibly valuable silk. Please try to avoid damaging them!
Okay, just fiddle with the fingers, reach with the other hand and… there! Gloves removed.
There isn't a time limit for me to take my clothes off, is there? Because these gloves are slightly difficult to remove...
~Name~ lost? Does that mean he'll strip in front of us?
Why did ~name~... Oh, she has the worst hand?
No hard feelings, okay? I know it's a woman's wardrobe that makes her beautiful, but rules are rules...
I knew I would have a better hand than ~name~. She makes the same expression Karol makes when he has a bad hand.
Um, may I ask a question? I heard you were locked in a gilded cage, right?
You're a goddess, right? I never thought I'd see one myself… I thought they were only fairy tales, like "Brave Vesperia and the Child of the Full Moon"!
If you're an all-knowing goddess... maybe you could answer some questions I still have. Too bad I can't remember any of them right now...
I'm sure assassins wear really fancy underwe- Huh?
